db:abstract.db:para: The QStyleOptionRubberBand class is used to describe the parameters needed for drawing a rubber band.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QStyleOptionRubberBand contains all the information that QStyle functions need to draw QRubberBand.

For performance reasons, there are few member functions and the access to the member variables is direct (i.e., using the . or -> operator). This makes the structures straightforward to use and emphasizes that these are simply parameters used by the style functions.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionRubberBand::StyleOptionType
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.

db:td.db:para: The type of style option provided (SO_RubberBand for this class).

db:section.db:para: The type is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionRubberBand::StyleOptionVersion
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
The version is used by QStyleOption subclasses to implement extensions without breaking compatibility. If you use qstyleoption_cast(), you normally do not need to check it.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionRubberBand::QStyleOptionRubberBand()
db:section.db:para: Creates a QStyleOptionRubberBand, initializing the members variables to their default values.

db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other style option.

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionRubberBand::opaque
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether the rubber band is required to be drawn in an opaque style

db:section.db:title: QRubberBand::Shape QStyleOptionRubberBand::shape
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the shape of the rubber band
